title: Avita PURA APU Dual Core A6 9220e - (8 GB/256 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home) NS14A6ING541-IBB Thin and Light Laptop  (14 inches, Ink Black, 1.34 kg)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents

product_description.Minimalistic Design: Boasting a sleek, minimalistic design, the Avita Pura APU Laptop will enhance the overall aesthetics of your desk. And, its simple design requires little to no maintenance.
product_description.Compact Design: Weighing just about 1.344 kg, this laptop is slim and compact enough to carry with you even when you're on the move.
product_description.High-quality Visuals: Designed with an anti-glare display, this laptop ensures that your eyes are safeguarded against harsh light, thereby minimising eye strain. And, with intensified pixels in each frame, this laptop offers stellar picture quality.
product_description.Effortless Connectivity: Thanks to its multiple ports, this laptop can be connected to other devices for enhanced convenience.

review: This is very good laptop for beginner and this is the best laptop under this price, its battery backup around 2.30 hours, I can easily run python. ,anaconda .vs code for data science, its fast connectivity ,internet suffering is very fast and laptop run smoothly
Perfect configuration as price, it would be better to use it properly, it is not suitable for business, if used personally, good, model is great. personal and office use is better.
Nice laptop in this pric range no other brand gives these features in this price range good for normal uses very good for student study propose over all good laptop

Nice laptop for the price, due to current market situation this laptop is good priced that's all. Specs is good only if the processor was atleast new gen athelon then it would have been great. Nevertheless this is a backup product for those who can't get any other good laptop in around 25k.

Laptop is very good in looking as well as performence but battary backup is very poor.. I can not start my laptop without connecting it to charger .. If i remove charger battary will discharge within 30 minut. If they will improve thier battary quality then this laptop is worth .

This product is very very very basic, only useful for internet browsing . This laptop doesn't supports dual band wifi so no hi speed internet works.
If you are looking for online video streaming or online classes for kids , never buy it. The video and voice is not stable at all. Overall a waste of money.
Now i don't know what to do with this.
Its a good one at this affordable price, very beautifully designed. And one more thing its a comparatively lighter in weight...
its good , battery backup is not good ,general heating problem but display nice value for money and good working .so this is good not nice not best😐

Disappointed, Avita has cunningly toned down the specs. I had purchased Avita Pura last year with same 8GB Ram and 256 GB SSD storage and went for it again. But this laptop Amd A6 processor is way slower than the previous Ryzen 3, processor, also wifi 802.11 ac is missing, update message says system does not meet minimum requirements for win 11 and boot time is over a minute too, which was not the case with the predessor.

Hello, here I am sharing my personal experience, how i first time felt when Avita pura was in my hands.

First and foremost, This laptop is great for student use, but only for beginners, and it's very easy to use. Nobody will face any difficulties in basic usage. Click the power button and it takes just 10 to 15 seconds to start.
It's not for hard gaming or programming, because the processor is of entry level.
To sum up all, this is made for office documentation work, online classes for students, to do homework etc.
Battery backup only 2.5 hour

pros.Price: Good laptop at such low price.
pros.Performance: The AMD APU Dual Core A6 processor is very slow and the performance is just average.

cons.Battery: Battery backup is average. Gives 4-5 hours max time.

summary.verdict: The Avita PURA APU Dual Core A6 9220e laptop is suited only for basic use.
